ingredients.content: ½ lemon, thin peelings of skin only
2 cm fresh ginger, cut in round slices (2 mm)
300 g carrots, cut in pieces (3-4 cm)
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper
2 sprigs fresh coriander, plus more for serving

preparations.content: Place lentils, lemon peelings and ginger into mixing bowl then grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and grind again <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add carrots, onion and butter then chop <b>4 sec/speed 4.5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add stock, salt and pepper then cook <b>15 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Add coriander and milk then blend until smooth <b>1 min/speed 5<b> <b> -10, increasing speed gradually<b>. Serve hot, garnished with coriander and a swirl of cream if desired.
